Sasuke and Naruto prepare a [[Scorch Release: Halo Hurricane Jet Black Arrow Style Zero]], which Naruto throws at their opponent. When the opponent is pushed back by it, Sasuke [[Amenotejikara|teleports]] behind them, kicking them back, positioning them between Naruto and himself. Sasuke manifests a [[Susanoo]] arm through which he [[Susanoo: Chidori|channels Chidori]] and [[Blaze Release: Susanoo Kagutsuchi|Kagutsuchi]], Naruto [[Kurama Arm Attack|focuses Kurama's chakra]] on his fist, and the two strike their opponent, which results in a massive explosion visible even from space.
